Uses of Class
BBjGridExWidgetColumnDefinition

    • Uses of BBjGridExWidgetColumnDefinition in <Unnamed>

      Subclasses of BBjGridExWidgetColumnDefinition in <Unnamed> 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BBjGridExWidgetAutoGroupColumn
      Allows specifying the group 'auto column' if you are not happy with the default.
      class  BBjGridExWidgetColumn
      The class holds the grid column props , it aslo introduces serveral helper methods to update the styles like , fore/back colors.
      class  BBjGridExWidgetColumnGroup
      The class holds the grid column group.
      class  BBjGridExWidgetDefaultColumnDefinition
      The class reprensets the default column defintion which the grid will use.
      class  BBjGridExWidgetDefaultColumnGroup
      The class holds the default grid column group.
